name: HonkStory 2: There was No 1 (itch)
description:
Play as Slippery McGee, a clown without limits that can only fight with his fists! Do you have what it takes to slip passed enemies, jump through obstacles, fight malevolent bosses getting in your way of spreading THE FUNNY throughout the universe?!

You can't stop the funny!

This is an early beta access of the game expect a few glitches. 

To exit: alt-tab, right click icon, exit window. Or task manager ctrl-alt-delete End Task

Move with Arrows Keys

Jump: Arrow Up/ X

Crouch: Arrow Down/ Z

Punch: C
